title: game wont open
body: Oky so what happens is I click on the lol shortcut see the symbol an then a little grey box pops up says that I cant connect to the http server please check internet connection  and fire to ensure its not blocking access, done that tried turn off firewall and using different internet, still pops up its been 2 days and im missing my lol sessions, any help or other otions would be appreciated

replies.body:
Hey Wallace1093toiR,

Please try the solutions provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article.
